title: Major Storm
description: A severe storm hits your area. Power outages, flooding risk, and you're stuck inside together.
responses: Make the best of it with your partner
Prepare and stay safe
Help neighbors who might need it

title: Heatwave
description: Extreme heat makes everything difficult. AC struggles, energy bills soar, and everyone's tempers are short.
responses: Find creative ways to stay cool
Check on vulnerable neighbors
Take it easy and stay hydrated

title: Earthquake/Tremor
description: The ground shakes unexpectedly. Even if minor, it's unsettling and reminds you how fragile stability can be.
responses: Check on each other and process the fear
Review your emergency preparedness
Find comfort in being together

title: Wildfire Smoke
description: Distant wildfires fill the air with smoke. The sky is orange, breathing is difficult, and you can't go outside.
responses: Seal up the house and use air filtration
Support those directly affected
Find indoor ways to stay sane

title: Flood Warning
description: Heavy rains bring flood warnings. You might need to evacuate or move belongings to higher ground.
responses: Prepare and evacuate if necessary
Protect what you can
Lean on each other through the uncertainty

title: Tornado Warning
description: Tornado sirens wail. You need to take shelter immediately. The fear is real.
responses: Get to safety and stay calm
Hold each other through the fear
Be grateful when it passes

title: Blizzard
description: A massive snowstorm traps you at home. Roads are impassable, supplies might run low.
responses: Bundle up and make it cozy
Check on isolated neighbors
Turn it into quality time together

title: Drought Impact
description: Prolonged drought affects your water supply, garden, and community. Conservation becomes critical.
responses: Adapt your lifestyle and conserve water
Support community solutions
Find gratitude for what you have

title: Hurricane/Typhoon
description: A major hurricane is bearing down. Evacuation orders, boarding up, the full disaster prep drill.
responses: Follow evacuation orders and stay safe
Protect what you can, accept what you can't
Face the crisis together as a team

title: Power Grid Failure
description: A widespread power outage lasts for days. No electricity, limited communication, growing uncertainty.
responses: Pool resources and help each other
Appreciate simpler times together
Stay informed and patient
